oai_dc:dc.dc:title: CPW-fed modified rectangular printed monopole antenna with slot
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RAY, KP
RANGA, Y
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: printed monopole
wireless communication
uwb
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper presents a CPW-fed modified rectangular printed monopole antenna. The configuration has semicircular base with circular slot cut Inside the patch. The Impedance and radiation characteristics of the proposed monopole are compared with that of a printed rectangular monopole. The proposed CPW-fed printed monopole antenna has ultra broad bandwidth which covers almost all the communications channels starting from 916 MHz.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: 2007 SBMO/IEEE MTT-S INTERNATIONAL MICROWAVE AND OPTOELECTRONICS CONFERENCE, VOLS 1 AND 2,79-81
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: SBMO/IEEE MTT-S International Microwave and Optoelectronics Conference,Salvador, BRAZIL,OCT 29-NOV 01, 2007
